product_name: Repel Insect Repellent Stakes - Package of 5
long_description: Keep mosquitos away from your campfire or picnic spot with Repel Insect Repellent Stakes. Each easy-to-light, slow-burning stake provides up to 4 hrs. of protection. Active ingredient: D-cis/trans allethrin (0.25%). Package includes 5 stakes.
short_description: Keep mosquitos away from your campfire or picnic spot with Repel Insect Repellent Stakes.
